_comment: Minecraft Bedrock (Auto-Update) - Menggunakan Image Yolk Standar Debian
name: Minecraft Bedrock (Auto-Update)
author: opensource@pterodactyl.io
description: Menjalankan server Minecraft Bedrock resmi. Menggunakan skrip Bedrock-OSS untuk auto-fetch.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Skrip Instalasi Bedrock (Menggunakan Bedrock-OSS)
set -e

echo "Menginstal dependensi (wget, curl, jq, unzip)..."
apt-get update
apt-get install -y wget curl jq unzip

cd /mnt/server

echo "Mencari versi stabil terbaru dari Bedrock-OSS..."
LATEST_VERSION=$(curl -sSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Bedrock-OSS/BDS-Versions/main/versions.json | jq -r '.linux.stable')
if [ -z "${LATEST_VERSION}" ] || [ "${LATEST_VERSION}" == "null" ]; then
    echo "Gagal mendapatkan versi stabil terbaru."
    exit 1
fi
echo "Versi stabil terbaru: ${LATEST_VERSION}"

echo "Mencari URL download untuk versi ${LATEST_VERSION}..."
DOWNLOAD_URL=$(curl -sSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Bedrock-OSS/BDS-Versions/main/linux/${LATEST_VERSION}.json | jq -r '.download_url')
if [ -z "${DOWNLOAD_URL}" ] || [ "${DOWNLOAD_URL}" == "null" ]; then
    echo "Gagal mendapatkan URL download."
    exit 1
fi
echo "URL Download: ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"

wget -O bedrock_server.zip "${DOWNLOAD_URL}"
echo "Mengekstrak file server..."
unzip -o bedrock_server.zip
rm bedrock_server.zip

echo "Instalasi server Bedrock selesai."
